Mr IYER is going to attend, Rajdhani College's Annual Techfest Techhertz'16, and he has registered for all the events. 
But later he came to know that timing of many events are clashing with each other and he can participate in a single event at a time.

Now to maximise his chances of winning, he wants to participate in maximum no. of events.
Please tell him the the maximum no. of events he can attend.

Input

First Line of Input contains a single integer T denoting the number of test cases, the description of T test case follows.
First Line of each test case contains a single integer integer N denoting the number of events.
Next N lines of each test case contains two integers Ai and Bi, denoting the start and end times of events.


Output

In a single line for each test case, output the maximum no. of events Mr IYER can attend.


Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 10
1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
1 ≤ Ai ≤ Bi ≤ 10^6


Example
Input:

1
5
1 4
2 3
5 6
5 8
6 7

Output:

2


Explanation
Example case 1. maximun number of events Mr IYER can attend is 2, for example: (1,4),(5,6)
